item.title: 新时代美国家庭债务压力空前沉重
item.description:
信用危机正在使美国人对经济感到失望，并可能拖累乔-拜登总统的连任竞选。【原文：

Credit woes are souring Americans on the economy and could be a drag on President Joe Biden’s reelection bid.

】

item.title: 南非央行行长克加亚戈再获连任
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）再次任命莱塞特贾-卡冈亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）为南非央行行长，任期五年。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa reappointed Lesetja Kganyago as governor of the country’s central bank for another five-year term.】

item.title: 安哥拉寻求中国和私人资金建设炼油厂和空军基地
item.description: 安哥拉总统若昂-卢伦科说，安哥拉正在寻求中国或私人投资者的融资，以便在港口城市洛比托建设一个炼油厂、一个石化厂和一个空军基地。【原文：Angola seeks financing from China or private investors to build a refinery at the port city of Lobito, a petrochemical plant and a military air force base, President Joao Lourenco said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在下周美联储做出利率决定之前，投资者将不得不面对数据真空。另外，日本也有可能加息，比特币的热度正在减退。下面是人们正在谈论的话题。— Sofia Horta e Costa想要接收本新闻通讯的西班牙语版本吗？注册获取 Five Things：西班牙语版时事通讯。【原文：Good morning. Investors will have to navigate a data vacuum before next week’s Fed decision on interest rates. Plus, a rate hike is in play in Japan and Bitcoin fervor is losing steam. Here’s what people are talking about. — Sofia Horta e CostaWant to receive this newsletter in Spanish? Sign up to get the Five Things: Spanish Edition newsletter.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索如此坚挺 投资者担心对其不利
item.description: 投资者正在将世界上最昂贵的货币推向更加令人眼花缭乱的高度，将降息、分裂性选举和分析师警告带来的风险置之脑后。【原文：Investors are pushing the world’s most expensive currency to ever more dizzying heights, shrugging off the risks from interest-rate cuts, divisive elections and analyst warnings.】

item.title: 鹰派徘徊于美联储和日本央行的选择，债券下跌
item.description: 欢迎收看 "每周快讯"（Weekly Fix），这份快讯总是以点带面。我是彭博社亚洲市场直播团队负责人加菲尔德-雷诺兹。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that’s always plotting dots. I’m Garfield Reynolds, Bloomberg’s Markets Live team leader in Asia.】

item.title: 尽管通胀率上升，美联储仍将坚持 2024 年的三次减税政策
item.description: 据彭博新闻社调查的经济学家称，近期通胀回升不太可能改变美联储决策者对今年降息三次、2025 年降息四次的预测。【原文：A recent pickup in inflation isn’t likely to shift Federal Reserve policymakers’ forecasts for three interest-rate cuts this year and four in 2025, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 印度降低电动汽车进口税以吸引特斯拉等企业
item.description: 印度削减了承诺在当地设厂的全球公司的电动汽车进口关税，因为印度希望在全国投票前吸引特斯拉公司等国际企业。【原文：India slashed the import duty on electric vehicles for global companies that commit to setting up local factories as the country seeks to appeal to international players like Tesla Inc. ahead of national polls.】

item.title: 欧盟警告：船舶面临索马里海盗日益严重的威胁
item.description: 欧盟表示，索马里海盗行为对商船运输的威胁正在增加，目前有四个团伙可能在该国海岸线活动。【原文：The threat to merchant shipping from Somali piracy is increasing, with four groups potentially operating on the country’s coastline, the EU said.】

item.title: 香港楼市调控取消后首个完整周房价下跌
item.description: 香港取消房地产限购后的第一个完整星期，二手房价格下跌。【原文：Hong Kong’s used home prices dropped in the first full week after the city scrapped its property curbs.】

item.title: 前高盛合伙人的 Panview 对冲基金规模达到 10 亿美元
item.description: 一位知情人士称，高盛集团前合伙人 Ryan Thall 的泛景资本有限公司（Panview Capital Ltd.）的资产已达到 11 亿美元，促使这家总部位于香港的公司自年底起停止接受新投资者的资金。【原文：Assets of former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partner Ryan Thall’s Panview Capital Ltd. have hit $1.1 billion, prompting the Hong Kong-based firm to stop taking money from fresh investors since year-end, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 千禧基金聘请美国银行的考夫曼加入固定收益团队
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由资深交易员 Diego Megia 运营的千禧管理公司支持的对冲基金已经从美国银行公司聘请了 Ilana Kaufman 担任投资组合经理。【原文：The Millennium Management-backed hedge fund run by senior trader Diego Megia has hired Ilana Kaufman from Bank of America Corp. as a portfolio manager, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 农历新年压制融资，中国信贷增长放缓
item.description: 由于春节长假抑制了融资活动，中国 2 月份信贷增长放缓。【原文：China’s credit growth slowed in February as the long Lunar New Year holiday curbed financing activity.】

item.title: 印度 2 月贸易赤字略有扩大，进口增加
item.description: 印度 2 月份的贸易赤字略有扩大，原因是国内需求强劲导致进口增长。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened marginally in February as the nation’s imports grew amid strong domestic demand.】

item.title: 普拉博沃即将获胜，印尼为抗议活动做好准备
item.description: 印尼国防部长普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）已经宣布赢得了二月份的总统选举，在正式宣布选举结果之前，印尼正在加强安全。【原文：Indonesia is beefing up security ahead of the official announcement of the result of February presidential elections, where Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto has already claimed victory.】

item.title: 欧洲股市迎来2018年以来最长连胜期
item.description: 欧洲股市有望连续第八周上涨，创下2018年以来最长连涨纪录，这主要是由于人们相信欧元区利率将在未来几个月开始下降。【原文：European stocks were on track for their eighth consecutive week of gains — the longest winning streak since 2018 — lifted by conviction that euro-area interest rates will start to fall in the coming months.】

item.title: 汇丰银行塞尔斯表示，今年国债利率仍有可能达到 3
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的私人银行和财富部门表示，随着对价格降温和潜在政治风险的押注趋于一致，国债将在今年晚些时候大涨。【原文：Treasuries are set to gain big later this year as bets on cooling prices and potential political risks converge, according to the private banking and wealth arm of HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 香港考虑延长全球薪酬最高央行行长的任期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港政府正在考虑在余永定的本届任期于 10 月届满后，继续留任他作为事实上的央行行长。【原文：Hong Kong government is considering keeping Eddie Yue as its de-facto central bank chief after his current term expires in October, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 顶级加密货币交易所 Binance 分拆价值 100 亿美元的风险投资部门
item.description: 今年早些时候，加密货币交易所 Binance 悄然分拆了其价值 100 亿美元的风险投资部门，这是首席执行官理查德-滕（Richard Teng）四个月任期内最引人注目的进展之一。【原文：Crypto exchange Binance quietly spun off its $10 billion venture capital arm earlier this year in one of the most notable developments yet of Chief Executive Officer Richard Teng’s four-month-old tenure.】

item.title: 投资者摒弃滞胀，美股迎来创纪录资金流入
item.description: 根据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的数据，投资者正在摒弃滞胀的风险，使创纪录的资金流入美国股市。【原文：Investors are dismissing the risk of stagflation, sending record flows into US equities, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 兴登堡做空后波兰人民党大幅下挫
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）看空波兰最大的时装零售商 LPP SA 后，该公司股价在华沙暴跌 21%。【原文：LPP SA shares plunged as much as 21% in Warsaw after Hindenburg Research took a short position in Poland’s biggest fashion retailer.】

item.title: 中国发出信号：流动性狂欢已到极限，目标是增长
item.description: 中国出人意料地提醒那些几个月来一直在现金池里游泳的银行家们，中国增加流动性的目的是振兴经济，而不是帮助支持金融投机。【原文：China offered a surprise reminder to bankers swimming in a pool of cash for months now that its liquidity boost is aimed at rejuvenating the economy, not helping support financial speculation.】

item.title: 中国将收紧首次公开募股（IPO），检查上市公司以促进股市上涨
item.description: 中国市场监管机构誓言收紧境内上市要求，并加强对上市公司的检查，这是其为中国 9.2 万亿美元的股市注入信心的最新努力。【原文：China’s markets regulator vowed to tighten listing requirements onshore and beef up checks on listed firms, in its latest effort to inject confidence in the nation’s $9.2 trillion stock market.】

item.title: 拜登冻结液化天然气项目导致项目延期并危及美国市场份额
item.description: 拜登政府暂停向液化天然气出口商发放新许可证的做法，已经使原本计划在本十年晚些时候投产的项目进展受阻。【原文：The Biden administration’s pause on new licenses for liquefied natural gas exporters is already stalling progress for projects that were aiming to come online later this decade.】

item.title: 工业政策和亚历山大-汉密尔顿被遗忘的一面
item.description:
开国元勋关于国家主导发展的愿景。【原文：

The founding father's vision of state-directed development.

】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑将迎来 12 月初以来最糟糕的一周
item.description: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑将迎来 12 月初以来最糟糕的一周【原文：FTSE 100 Live: Pound Heads For Worst Week Since Early December】

item.title: 中国房地产危机持续，铁矿石跌破 100 美元
item.description: 铁矿石期货七个月来首次跌破每吨 100 美元，原因是投资者押注中国长达数年的房地产危机将持续到 2024 年，从而抑制了钢铁需求。【原文：Iron ore futures fell below $100 a ton for the first time in seven months as investors bet that China’s years-long property crisis will run through 2024, keeping a lid on steel demand.】

item.title: 花旗称印度流动性宽松预示宽松周期开始
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：The improvement in India’s banking liquidity has pushed key overnight rates lower toward the policy rate after a five-month gap, signaling the start of a monetary policy easing in India, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 随着风暴增强，澳大利亚可能再受两个气旋袭击
item.description: 澳大利亚北部沿海的两个风暴可能在周末变成热带气旋，这是今年以来袭击澳大利亚大陆的一系列风暴中的最新一个；这些风暴破坏了基础设施，损害了农作物。【原文：Two storms developing off Australia’s northern coast are likely to become tropical cyclones over the weekend, the latest in a series that have struck the continent this year — damaging infrastructure and hurting crops.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】
